Entries.default: This bulbous pouch of glistening silk hangs from a thick cable of webbing that ascends along the Collections into the darkness above.
The lift spider watches your approach.
[Gesture upwards.] "Take me up to whatever's above."
[Gesture towards the entrance of the Collections.]
[Gesture downwards.] "Lower me into the depths."
[Leave.]
"You intend to put us in this sac, don't you."
"Uh... are we supposed to climb into this thing?"
"Ishi, cut it out. You're gonna get all tangled up again." Maia pinches Ishiza's tailfeathers until he stops pecking at the cable.
"Little swabby's smarter than he looks, cap. He be waiting for orders from you."
"Ladies first. No. Really." TekÄ“hu gestures for you to take the lead.
"Captain - I believe this creature bound by the vithrack. It appears to desire instruction."
"Some kind of vithrack dumbwaiter. Perhaps we can make use of it."
"Do we get to ride in it?"

"Doubtless nothing will go wrong."

Vatnir shakes his head.

As the sac sways gently to either side, you notice a small spherical object set into it. At first you mistake it for a solid black gem, but then it shifts, and you find eight eyes peering up at you from a fist-sized spider.
"Er, hello?"
"You've been trained by the vithrack, haven't you? Will you take me where I want to go?"
"Mess with me, I'll stomp you into spider sauce."
[Study the spider.]
The spider watches you expectantly.
The spider stares at you.
The spider studies you back.
It seems to be awaiting instructions from you, and if it harbors any ill will or duplicity, you can't suss it from its arachnid features.
"And you won't raise any alarms?"
Its mandibles twitch.
"I ain't going to lie, Watcher."
"Everything that's happened since Gilded Vale. Dyrford. Thaos. Eothas getting up and stomping around."
"I think this moment might have made it all worthwhile."
The spider scurries up the strand into the darkness above as you climb into the silken sac.
The spider scurries up the strand into the darkness above as you climb into the silken sac.
[Gesture towards the vithrack commune above the Collections.]
[Gesture towards the sublevels of the Collections.]
